title: Print, ca. 1788
inscribed:
Imprinted from lower left to lower left center: Un des Sphinx de Mabre Noir/Antique qui sont au bas de l'escalier du Capital vue de face//Aubert P. fecit

Imprinted lower center: Vase du Composition pose sur un Tombeau Antique de Marbre/qui se voit a Rome pres le College de Grecs

Imprinted from lower right: Vase et autres objets Antique du Museum du Capital.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: At center is a large vase upon a pedestal flanked by a small sphynx on the left and a smaller vase with other objects on the right

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ca. 1788.
ca. 1788. Sheet: 44.1 x 29.4 cm (17 3/8 x 11 9/16 in.). Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-228-3.
